column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The quality of Jinya has gone down since I lasted visited a year ago.  My husband and I went here towards the end of May 2017 and ordered 2 bowls of ramen.  We were waiting for about 20 minutes for our order and the waitress was really nice saying she'd check on it.  However
column2: I think our ramen bowls were sitting there for awhile.  When we got our meal
column3: the soup seemed to have coagulated so that's how we knew.  The noodles were slightly soggy and lukewarm.  We didn't even finish our noodles/soup.  Needless to say
column4: we will not be going back.
